column3: ‘But it’s only ten o’clock, you know,’ said Wellington, coming out of a dream and looking at his enormous wristwatch.
ALL THOSE WOMBLES INTERESTED IN JOINING THIS PROJECT SHOULD SEE COUSIN BOTANY AT 8 P.M. IN THE PLAYROOM THIS EVENING.
SPECIAL AND EXTRA WOMBLE TIDY GROUPS NEEDED. ALL THOSE INTERESTED IN SPECIAL DUTIES SHOULD SEE TOBERMORY AT 8 P.M. IN THE WORKSHOP THIS EVENING.
‘Nothing like a bit of digging to make you strong then,’ said Botany. ‘Collect your spade at six o’clock sharp!’
